title: Truth or Dare
description: Leah and Jess have been friends for years, and having set up business together, they are even more aware of the need to keep things strictly professional.However, all that changes after one drunken dare leads them to discover unbelievable passion. Who knew when friends become lovers the result would be so explosive and life-altering, even if things seem different in the cold light of day.Can two friends face the truth and find happiness or was it a dare too far?
author: Michaela Rhua
